rules.description: Post escape if fn is pressed alone.
command to mission_control if pressed alone
[MOD] right_command to control with pgUp/pgdown/arrows/tab (for Mac keyboard).
[MOD] right_control to right_command if not in iterm2|alacritty|terminal|firefox.
[forwarder] control to command shortcuts in firefox|chrome.
[MOD] left_control to left_command if not in iTerm2|alacritty|terminal|firefox|chrome.
Ctrl + Left Click to Left Click (fix right click; use a 2 buttons mouse)
